name: PAX_JOURNEY_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of a list of passenger journeys, where each journey is uniquely identified by 'PaxJourneyID', has a duration, and references a segment via 'PaxSegmentRefID'.
prompt: Verify that each <PaxJourney> in <PaxJourneyList> contains a unique <PaxJourneyID>, a valid <Duration>, and a <PaxSegmentRefID> referencing a segment.
